title: (x) "Brad Mehldau" slab serif - FF Seria {James}
content:
Hi,   
Any help identifying this typeface much appreciated! ![From the Album 'Brad Mehldau"](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68809.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Pixco pixel font - Mini 7 {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10128 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith - Albertus {James} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10113 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pbags

comments.content: This is [FF Seria](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/seria/lf-bold/testdrive.html?s=B+R+A+D+MELDAU&p=72) by Martin Majoor. And yes, he was born in a Baarn. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Here's a direct link to FontShop, the source for purchasing FontFonts like [FF Seria](http://web.archive.org/web/20081117202606/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11178.5.19&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=B+R+A+D++M+E+H+L+D+A+U&sampleSize=24).
